articles.title: How BIM Works
articles.description: BIM helps AEC professionals to greatly decrease the effort and time needed to accomplish construction projects. But how does BIM work, and what is the BIM process?
articles.title_description: : What Is BIM and BIM Process
articles.introduction: The Building Information Modeling or BIM process has been around since the 1970s, but it became pervasive 15 or so years ago. With the evolution of cloud infrastructure and Сomputer-Aided Design (CAD), the architecture, engineering, and construction (AEC) professionals saw considerable improvements in their project workflows.
articles.meta_description: BIM helps AEC professionals to greatly decrease the effort and time needed to accomplish construction projects. But how does BIM work, and what is the BIM process?

articles.description: Want to discover the advantages of the laser scanning technique in the construction industry? Read about 3D laser scanning in construction here.
articles.introduction: The laser scanning market is more active than you might have thought. Its global revenues will increase by $10 billion in 2024.
